Articles.Content:
Hi Kerbals

When I was exploring kerbin surface I had ultimate idea

Cities & Kerbals :

there ore will be about 50 city in kerbin and 10 villages

And it will be you can almost see half of it in day and all of it in night and when you go to it you will find new Kerbals different from original one maybe with mustache

Trading :

there is always useful Kerbals there is some who can trade new rocket ships and you buy it with funds and every part you buy you should test it by command from mission control

Astronauts :

there red will be 10% to find an astronaut In cities or villages it quite hard to find them but imagine new astronauts that's amazing

that all I think cities already suggested but this topic I think is different

bye
